org.cojen.tupl.repl

Interface Writer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable

    public interface Writer
extends Closeable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close() 
      long index()
      Returns the next log index which will be written to.
      long term() 
      long waitForCommit(long index, long nanosTimeout)
      Blocks until the commit index reaches the given index.
      default int write(byte[] messages)
      Write complete messages to the log.
      default int write(byte[] messages, int offset, int length)
      Write complete messages to the log.
      int write(byte[] messages, int offset, int length, long highestIndex)
      Write complete or partial messages to the log.

    • Method Detail

      • term

        long term()

      • index

        long index()
        Returns the next log index which will be written to.

      • write

        default int write(byte[] messages)
           throws IOException
        Write complete messages to the log. Implementation is permitted reject or truncate conflicting messages, unless doing so would force the commit index to retreat.
        Returns:
        amount of bytes written, which is less than the message length only if the term end has been reached
        Throws:
        IOException

      • write

        default int write(byte[] messages,
                  int offset,
                  int length)
           throws IOException
        Write complete messages to the log. Implementation is permitted reject or truncate conflicting messages, unless doing so would force the commit index to retreat.
        Returns:
        amount of bytes written, which is less than the given length only if the term end has been reached
        Throws:
        IOException

      • write

        int write(byte[] messages,
          int offset,
          int length,
          long highestIndex)
   throws IOException
        Write complete or partial messages to the log. Implementation is permitted reject or truncate conflicting messages, unless doing so would force the commit index to retreat.
        Parameters:
        highestIndex - highest index (exclusive) which can become the commit index
        Returns:
        amount of bytes written, which is less than the given length only if the term end has been reached
        Throws:
        IOException

      • waitForCommit

        long waitForCommit(long index,
                   long nanosTimeout)
            throws IOException
        Blocks until the commit index reaches the given index.
        Parameters:
        nanosTimeout - relative nanosecond time to wait; infinite if <0
        Returns:
        current commit index, or -1 if timed out or if term finished before the index could be reached, or MIN_VALUE if closed
        Throws:
        IOException

      • close

        void close()
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
